export interface IPageContentController {
    pageTitle:string;
    pageLayout:string;
    linkText:string;
    linkTarget:string;
    linkIcon:string;
    isBusy:boolean;
    busyMessage: string;
    init(defaultTitle:string): void;
}
 
export class PageContentController implements IPageContentController {
    public pageTitle:string;
    public pageLayout:string;
    public linkText:string;
    public linkTarget:string;
    public linkIcon:string;
    public isBusy:boolean;
    public busyMessage:string;
 
    public init = (defaultTitle:string) => {
        if (!this.pageTitle && angular.isDefined(defaultTitle)) {
            this.pageTitle = defaultTitle;
        }
 
        if (!this.pageLayout) {
            this.pageLayout = "fullWidth";
        }
    };E
 
    public showLink = () => {
        return !_.isEmpty(this.linkText);
    };
 
    public showIcon = () => {
        return !_.isEmpty(this.linkIcon);
    };
}
